markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Attunement to Stone](/Feats.aspx?ID=892) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Living Monolith](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=16)

**Prerequisites**
[Ka Stone Ritual](/Feats.aspx?ID=889)

</column>

---

You become attuned to the stone around you. When in contact with a stone surface, you gain tremorsense (imprecise) 5 feet along that surface, and you can activate your _ka stone_ to cast [_meld into stone_](/Spells.aspx?ID=188).
name: Attunement to Stone
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Ka Stone Ritual](/Feats.aspx?ID=889)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You can feel vibrations through the ground.
</summary>
summary: You can feel vibrations through the ground.
summary_markdown: You can feel vibrations through the ground.
